abstract: Mrs. Bachmann earned standing ovations for vowing to repeal President Obama's signature health care law, calling it "socialized medicine." She also emphasized her commitment to the pro-life movement.
snippet: Mrs. Bachmann earned standing ovations for vowing to repeal President Obama's signature health care law, calling it "socialized medicine." She also emphasized her commitment to the pro-life movement.

headline.main: Warm Reception for Bachmann at Values Conference
